data.actual_result: Extra padding is present for short names, no padding for long names
data.expected_result: Equal offset regardless of the channel name length
data.short_description: Offset next to the role name disappears in channel overrides if the channel name is long
data.steps_to_repro: - Create two channels: one with very short name, another one with very long name - Go to the settings of the short channel - Add an override for a role - Observe there is an offset next to the role name - Go back and add an override on the long channel - Observe the offset isn't here anymore. For this to work, you need to make sure the long channel name displays on two lines
